WITH categorySales AS( SELECT pod.orderNum, total_sales, categoryName FROM product_order_detail pod LEFT OUTER JOIN store_order_list sol ON pod.orderNum = sol.orderNum )
SELECT '의류' section, NVL(SUM(total_sales),0) total FROM categorySales WHERE categoryName = '의류' UNION ALL SELECT '전자제품' section, NVL(SUM(total_sales),0) total FROM categorySales WHERE categoryName = '전자제품' UNION ALL SELECT '생필품' section, NVL(SUM(total_sales),0) total FROM categorySales WHERE categoryName = '생필품' UNION ALL SELECT '인테리어 가구' section, NVL(SUM(total_sales),0) total FROM categorySales WHERE categoryName = '인테리어가구'

WITH categorySalesYear AS( SELECT pod.orderNum, sol.total_sales, sol.order_date, categoryName FROM store_order_list sol LEFT OUTER JOIN product_order_detail pod ON pod.orderNum = sol.orderNum )
SELECT TO_CHAR(order_date,'YYYY') as OrderYear, NVL(SUM(DECODE(categoryName,'의류',total_sales)),0) clothes_total, NVL(SUM(DECODE(categoryName,'전자제품',total_sales)),0) electronics_total, NVL(SUM(DECODE(categoryName,'생필품',total_sales)),0) necessaries_total, NVL(SUM(DECODE(categoryName,'인테리어가구',total_sales)),0) interior_total FROM categorySalesYear WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(order_date,'YYYY')) > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY'))-5 AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(order_date,'YYYY')) <= TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(order_date,'YYYY') ORDER BY OrderYear
